data.current_description: Returns the sections for a teacher
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all sections taught by a teacher
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all sections (classes) taught by a specific teacher identified by their ID. Returns a SectionsResponse object containing a list of section records with details such as section name, course information, and enrollment data. Requires teacher ID as a path parameter. Supports pagination and filtering through query parameters.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague and lacks context about what data is returned, input requirements, and pagination support. Added specific details about the SectionsResponse schema, parameter requirements, and pagination capabilities to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns the students for a teacher
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all students taught by a teacher
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all students enrolled in sections taught by a specific teacher identified by their ID. Returns a StudentsResponse object containing a list of student records with details such as student name, ID, and enrollment information. Requires teacher ID as a path parameter. Supports pagination and filtering through query parameters.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague and lacks context about what data is returned, input requirements, and pagination support. data.current_description: Returns the primary teacher for a section
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve primary teacher for section
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the primary teacher assigned to a specific section. Requires the section ID as a path parameter. Returns a TeacherResponse object containing the teacher's details including name, credentials, and contact information.

data.current_description: Returns the teachers for a section
data.summary_suggestion: List all teachers for section
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all teachers associated with a specific section. Requires the section ID as a path parameter. Supports filtering and pagination through optional query parameters. Returns a TeachersResponse object containing a list of teacher records with their details.

Added clarity about TeachersResponse return type, documented parameter support for filtering and pagination, and specified the required district ID parameter to help AI agents understand filtering capabilities and when to use this endpoint.
